Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class sys::MutexInterface< T >

The interface for any mutex.

This class defines the interface for any mutex in any package that is wrapped herein

Member Function Documentation

template<typename T>
T& sys::MutexInterface< T >::getNative (  )  [inline]

Returns the native type. You probably should not use this unless you have specific constraints on which package you use Use of this function may defeat the purpose of these classes: to provide thread implementation in an abstract interface.
